text: Aurélie Battu (born 18 September 1997) is a French water polo player. She was a member of the France women's national water polo team at the 2015 World Aquatics Championships, and 2017 World Aquatics Championships. and 2018 Women's European Water Polo Championship. On a club level, she plays for Union Saint-Bruno Bordeaux. == References == == Other websites== *"Aurelie Battu - Water Polo player profile & career statistics - Global Sports Archive". globalsportsarchive.com. *"Aurelie Battu of Francen and Valeria Mariagrazia Palmieri" Getty Images. *"Aurélie Battu, "Aller en plays-off serait une belle récompense" | Fédération Française de Natation". www.ffnatation.fr.
